Detailed Description

DES API.

Function Documentation

void DES_ncbc_encrypt (  const unsigned char *    in,
unsigned char *    out,
long    length,
DES_key_schedule *    _schedule,
DES_cblock *    ivec,
int    enc
) 
 

Single DES encrypt or decrypt.

Parameters:
in  The input buffer to be encrypted or decrypted based on enc parameter
out  The result is stored in the output buffer
length  Length of the input
_schedule  The key for DES operation are stored in the DES_key_schedule structure.
ivec  The Initialisation vector
enc  enc is either DES_ENCRYPT for encryption or DES_DECRYPT for decryption.
